title: Abnormal CPU usage and slowness

labels.name: priority 0: blocker
labels.description: an issues that requires immediate attention and that causes the app to not work at all (e.g a crash)

body: **Spotted in:** `Build #1391 (20-Sep-2021 21:34:52)` When typing in anything in a chat box, the input is very slow, also there is abnormal CPU usage when doing so. It is getting worse when using mentions. https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82375995/134130266-dc552868-26ca-49a6-9ec0-8fdf6a9d7f95.mov maybe be related to https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/3555

not sure but could the added logging in the mailservers.nim causing the lag ?

